about_the_game:
So much advice focuses on how to meet women, and the first 5 minutes. The fact is that although it might be your primary focus now, at some point the relationship part is going to be the most important.

Having a great relationship and keeping hold of the one you love is a great skill to have, and most people these days don't know how to do it. Learning these techniques mean that you won't end up with a broken heart.
